posts.content:
Hoping somebody might be able to help.
Before making my own interior I’m making a cooker unit for a friend.
It doesn’t have to be perfect but I would like to get the profile sizes correct. Unfortunately I have a 64 unit and he wants an earlier unit All I have are photos to go from.
All I really want to know is the thickness and width of the solid oak corners either side of the doors. Like this.........
